description: [Pikabot](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1145) uses base64 encoding in conjunction with symmetric encryption mechanisms to obfuscate command and control communications.(Citation: Zscaler Pikabot 2023)(Citation: Elastic Pikabot 2024)

external_references.description: Brett Stone-Gross & Nikolaos Pantazopoulos. (2023, May 24). Technical Analysis of Pikabot. Retrieved July 12, 2024.
Daniel Stepanic & Salim Bitam. (2024, February 23). PIKABOT, I choose you!. Retrieved July 12, 2024.
